attributes.action: Cease deducting income tax and NI from those who are attending work at this time
attributes.additional_details: I ask the government to do this as they have given countless concessions to all other workers and businesses but no consideration to those who risk infection and illness by having to go to work
attributes.background: Stop the paye and NI deductions for those who are still working in essential areas as we cannot stay home and receive 80% of our wages

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
